books.title: Thought Leaders
books.author: Matt Church, Scott Stein, Michael Henderson
books.blurb: A step-by-step framework to create impact, independence, and financial success without large teams or heavy capital investment.

books.title: The Culture Map
books.author: Erin Meyer
books.blurb: Navigating cultural differences in international workplace,how people from different cultures communicate, lead, make decisions, build trust, and manage time.

books.title: Emotional Intelligence
books.author: Daniel Goleman
books.blurb: The success in life and work depends not only on cognitive intelligence (IQ) but also on emotional intelligence (EQ).

books.title: Behave
books.author: Robert Sapolsky
books.blurb: The History of human Behaviour.Moral decisions are often subconscious, influenced by brain chemistry and social context.

books.title: The 21 Irrefutable Laws of Leadership
books.author: John C Maxwell
books.blurb: Leadership is influence, nothing more, nothing less, from business to politics to personal relationships.

books.title: Wabi Sabi
books.author: Beth Kempton
books.blurb: A practical guide to embracing imperfection, impermanence, and simplicity,
